General.Name: SCI Information Service Inc
General.Description: SCI Information Service Inc. provides credit information services in South Korea. It offers corporate credit evaluation and rating, technical credit assessment, identity-verifying, credit-in check, and debt tracking services for public agency entry and private enterprises, as well as asset management services for proposed NPL assets. The company was formerly known as SCI Rating Information Inc. and changed its name to SCI Information Service Inc. in April 2016. SCI Information Service Inc. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
